data.description:
**Project Demigod** is the ultimate superhero simulator. Stage massive, physics-driven comic book battles in a limitless sandbox. Toss cars into ninjas, fry robots with a bolt of energy, swing through cityscapes and take on enormous enemies.

Create your own superhero by mixing powers together for unique combinations. Select an arena and smash through your foes. 

You decide what type of hero to be. Who will you become?

# YOUR POWERS, YOUR PLAYGROUND
Master a list of 10 abilities both classic and innovative with physics-driven combat that provides a 1:1 superhero experience. Current powers include: Webs, Fire, Energy, Strength, Earth, Water, Stretching, Speed, and Lightning.

{416888334646637}

# FACE MINIONS AND MONSTERS
An army of enemies awaits. Fight robots, ninjas, dinosaurs and more, using physics-driven mechanics to launch them into the air, slice them with swords, or blast them with beams. New giant enemies provide the ultimate blockbuster showdown.

{759842372842723}

# BECOME YOUR OWN HERO
Choose from over 40 power combinations and create your dream hero. Spit fireballs from one hand as you lift enemies off of the ground with the other, or fire water from your left hand and lightning on the right. Project Demigod gives you the power to become a hero unlike any other.

{976644313672401}

# AN EVOLVING PLATFORM OF SUPERHEROICS
This is just the start of your story. With plans for new features on the way and full community mod support already included, Project Demigod offers an endless playground for super-powered action.

{955940172978584}
